overview: With nearly 20 years of experience in the private equity industry, Tim Dugan has completed more than $3 billion of transactions in healthcare and life sciences companies. Prior to founding Water Street, Tim was a founder and partner with First Chicago Equity Capital. He was appointed managing partner in 1999, and the following year helped establish and build One Equity Partners, the $5.5 billion private equity arm of JP Morgan Chase.

degrees.institution: University of Chicago Graduate School of Business
